programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith.(n)

programme.title: Pele: Birth Of A Legend
programme.desc: Biopic charting the meteoric rise of Brazilian football great Pele - from the slums of Sao Paulo to World Cup glory. Starring Kevin de Paula, Vincent D'Onofrio and Rodrigo Santoro.(n)

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the children's books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Rise Of The Footsoldier 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster Pat Tate rises through the ranks of Essex's criminal underworld. Prequel, starring Craig Fairbrass, Terry Stone and Roland Manookian.

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A police hostage negotiator is called in when a robbery turns into a siege. The chairman of the bank involved is worried the mastermind behind the heist is set to disclose secrets he needs to stay hidden, so he enlists the help of a political fixer. However, the elaborate nature of the thief's plan looks set to keep him one step ahead of the law, and causes problems for the detective assigned to rectify the situation. Spike Lee's thriller, with Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer, Willem Dafoe and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his family's Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Conclusion of Francis Ford Coppola's crime drama trilogy, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach, Bridget Fonda and Joe Mantegna.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A respected academic goes on the run when he is framed for the murder of a French historian. Pursued by the detective on the case and a sinister assassin monk, he strives to unmask the culprit, leading to a conspiracy determined to preserve a 2,000-year-old secret at any cost. Thriller based on Dan Brown's novel, starring Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Paul Bettany and Jean Reno.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: A psychopathic rapist is released from prison after 14 years and plots revenge on the defence attorney he blames for his imprisonment. Subjecting the lawyer and his family to a terrifying campaign of intimidation, he uses his knowledge of the law to stay untouchable. Martin Scorsese's thriller remake, starring Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange and Juliette Lewis, with cameo appearances by Gregory Peck, Robert Mitchum and Martin Balsam, who all appeared in the 1962 original.

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson.

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: A politician is attracted to a dancer he meets at a pivotal moment in his life, but finds his every effort to get to know her is thwarted by a group of mysterious men. He realises these shadowy figures are manipulating him and moving him toward a predetermined fate, which he resolves to fight. Sci-fi thriller, starring Matt Damon and Emily Blunt.

programme.title: Eliminators
programme.desc: A former federal agent in the witness protection programme is forced to come out of hiding and go on the run. Thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Stu Bennett and Daniel Caltagirone.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A mother looks to escape her abusive past by moving to a new town. There she befriends another mother, who grows suspicious of her. Thriller, starring Gina Gershon, Faye Dunaway and Nicolas Cage.

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: A British diplomat in Kenya takes charge of the investigation into the murder of his wife, who had published an article highly critical of the money-making collusion between the High Commission and a pharmaceutical manufacturer. Fernando Meirelles' political thriller, based on John le Carre's novel, with Ralph Fiennes, Rachel Weisz, Danny Huston and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In the 1980s, US pilot Barry Seal becomes a drug-runner for the CIA during a clandestine operation. Biopic, starring Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson and Sarah Wright.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles.

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: A smart-mouthed PR executive answers a public phone and the caller on the other end warns him that if he hangs up he will be shot. The unseen gunman then puts his target through a tortuous series of mind games, as well as incriminating him in the death of a bystander. Psychological thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Katie Holmes and Forest Whitaker.(n)

programme.title: Rising Sun
programme.desc: A cop investigating the murder of a prostitute in the Los Angeles offices of a Japanese corporation joins forces with a mysterious detective who is an expert on Asian culture. They discover security footage of the killer has been digitally altered, pointing to a secret conspiracy within the company. Thriller, adapted from the novel by Michael Crichton, starring Sean Connery, Wesley Snipes, Harvey Keitel and Tia Carrere.(n)

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.(n)

programme.title: Detour
programme.desc: A troubled LA law student drunkenly commits to a revenge plot against his stepfather. Crime thriller, starring Tye Sheridan, Emory Cohen and Bel Powley.(n)

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A doctor's wife recovering from a car accident is troubled by terrifying visions of a ghostly girl who seems to be asking for help from beyond the grave. While her husband thinks the experiences are the result of her recent trauma, a psychiatrist urges her to communicate with the spirit. Supernatural thriller, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Harrison Ford, Diana Scarwid and Joe Morton.(n)

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: The FBI agent who first captured Hannibal Lecter is called out of retirement to catch a demented murderer dubbed the Tooth Fairy, who slaughters a family whenever there is a full moon - forcing the detective to draw on the imprisoned cannibal's expertise in criminal psychology. Thriller prequel adapted from the first of Thomas Harris's Lecter novels, starring Anthony Hopkins, Edward Norton, Ralph Fiennes and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss ends up at an isolated motel, where the owner's curious relationship with his domineering mother results in murder. Alfred Hitchcock's psychological thriller, starring Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, Martin Balsam, John Gavin and John McIntire.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent is accused of being a sleeper assassin with a deadly purpose - to kill the Russian president during a diplomatic visit and start a third world war. She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A woman sets out to make life a living hell for her ex-husband's new fiancee. Thriller, starring Rosario Dawson, Katherine Heigl and Geoff Stults.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco.

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: The armoured avenger hunts for the mastermind behind an untraceable series of bombings, despite being cut off from his usual resources and traumatised by a recent brush with death. His search uncovers a secret conspiracy involving a drug that renders the user indestructible. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Gwyneth Paltrow and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger.

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: The masked hero returns to face the Penguin, a grotesque crime boss dwelling in the sewers who conspires with a corrupt businessman to make himself mayor. When the tycoon tries to kill his secretary, she returns as vengeful vigilante Catwoman, who soon forms an intense relationship with the dark knight in both their costumed and real identities. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito and Michelle Pfeiffer.

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The masked crimefighter takes on the twin threats of disfigured maniac Two-Face and insane genius the Riddler, who are plotting to control the brains of the entire world. Meanwhile, an acrobat whose family has been murdered by Two-Face steps up to join Batman in his fight against evil. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Nicole Kidman, Jim Carrey and Chris O'Donnell.

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures' fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors' safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger.

Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell.

programme.title: Camera Obscura
programme.desc: A veteran war photographer with PTSD sees imminent deaths in his developed photos, questioning his already fragile sanity and putting the lives of those he loves in danger. Thriller, starring Christopher Denham, Nadja Bobyleva and Catherine Curtin.

programme.title: Strange Days
programme.desc: A paranoid ex-cop dealing in illegal virtual-reality experiences receives a compact disc that contains the memories of a murderer killing a prostitute. Suspecting an old flame might be in danger, he investigates further and uncovers a secret that could throw the entire city into chaos on New Year's Eve, 1999. Kathryn Bigelow's sci-fi thriller, starring Ralph Fiennes, Angela Bassett, Juliette Lewis and Tom Sizemore.

programme.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: Julie James, the survivor of the original bloody events, sets off for a holiday in the Bahamas - but as soon as she arrives, her arch-enemy returns from the dead, forcing her into a desperate battle for survival. Horror sequel, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Freddie Prinze Jnr, Brandy Norwood and Mekhi Phifer.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on the Sky Cinema channels, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A mild-mannered doctor sets up practice in a small town, but a cloud gathers over his career due to a series of unexplained deaths. Before long, he has to convince the locals that a horde of venomous spiders is responsible and confront his intense fear of arachnids into the bargain. Comedy horror, starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands and Brian McNamara.

programme.title: Double Date
programme.desc: A 29-year-old virgin and his extrovert mate get more than they bargained for when they meet beautiful sisters with a hidden agenda. Comedy thriller, starring Danny Morgan, Georgia Groome and Michael Socha.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriend's father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: After the USS Enterprise is attacked during a rescue mission, Kirk, Spock and the crew struggle for survival on an alien planet while their mysterious assailant carries out his plans. Sci-fi adventure, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba.

programme.title: Bad Match
programme.desc: An internet-dating playboy finds his life spiralling out of control when he meets a woman online. Thriller, starring Jack Cutmore-Scott, Lili Simmons and Noureen DeWulf.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.

He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: After the USS Enterprise is attacked during a rescue mission, Kirk, Spock and the crew struggle for survival on an alien planet while their mysterious assailant carries out his plans. Sci-fi adventure, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba.

programme.title: Bad Match
programme.desc: An internet-dating playboy finds his life spiralling out of control when he meets a woman online. Thriller, starring Jack Cutmore-Scott, Lili Simmons and Noureen DeWulf.

programme.title: Double Date
programme.desc: A 29-year-old virgin and his extrovert mate get more than they bargained for when they meet beautiful sisters with a hidden agenda. Comedy thriller, starring Danny Morgan, Georgia Groome and Michael Socha.(n)

programme.title: Johnny Frank Garrett's Last Word
programme.desc: A young man wrongly sentenced to death for the murder of a Catholic nun wreaks vengeance from beyond the grave. Supernatural horror-thriller, starring Sean Patrick Flanery, Erin Cummings and Mike Doyle.(n)

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A mild-mannered doctor sets up practice in a small town, but a cloud gathers over his career due to a series of unexplained deaths. Before long, he has to convince the locals that a horde of venomous spiders is responsible and confront his intense fear of arachnids into the bargain. Comedy horror, starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands and Brian McNamara.(n)

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: Mortals and creatures set out to capture a young creature born to a human father and a monster queen. Fantasy adventure, starring Baihe Bai, Boran Jing and Wu Jiang. In Mandarin.(n)

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A squad of specially trained soldiers is sent in to investigate after all communication with a scientific research station on Mars ceases - but none of them is prepared for the hordes of monsters that have overrun the planet. Sci-fi thriller based on the video game, starring Dwayne Johnson, Karl Urban, Rosamund Pike, Dexter Fletcher and Ben Daniels.(n)

programme.title: Shin Godzilla
programme.desc: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster. Fantasy adventure, starring Hiroki Hasegawa, Yutaka Takenouchi and Satomi Ishihara.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Teenager Peter Parker, aka Spider-Man, must protect New York City from a menacing new villain, the Vulture. However, he does get a helping hand from Iron Man. Superhero adventure, starring Tom Holland, Michael Keaton and Robert Downey Jr.(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore.(n)

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A squad of specially trained soldiers is sent in to investigate after all communication with a scientific research station on Mars ceases - but none of them is prepared for the hordes of monsters that have overrun the planet. Sci-fi thriller based on the video game, starring Dwayne Johnson, Karl Urban, Rosamund Pike, Dexter Fletcher and Ben Daniels.(n)

programme.title: Shin Godzilla
programme.desc: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster. Fantasy adventure, starring Hiroki Hasegawa, Yutaka Takenouchi and Satomi Ishihara.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Teenager Peter Parker, aka Spider-Man, must protect New York City from a menacing new villain, the Vulture. However, he does get a helping hand from Iron Man. Superhero adventure, starring Tom Holland, Michael Keaton and Robert Downey Jr.(n)

programme.title: Patient Seven
programme.desc: A renowned psychiatrist selects six mentally ill hospital patients to interview as part of research for his new book, and discovers one patient is connected to them all. Horror anthology, starring Michael Ironside, Jack Plotnick and Drew Fonteiro.(n)

programme.title: Sorcerer
programme.desc: Four men with shady pasts take a lucrative and potentially fatal delivery job driving two trucks full of dangerously unstable dynamite along equally unsound roads through the South American jungle. William Friedkin's thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Bruno Cremer, Francisco Rabal and Amidou.

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A socially inept high-school student and his lonely unemployed brother find their eccentric home life thrown into upheaval when their meddling uncle comes to stay. The teenage oddball tries to make the best of his changing circumstances, while putting all his skills to the task of helping his new best friend win the class presidency. Comedy, starring Jon Heder, Efren Ramirez and Haylie Duff.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes
programme.desc: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: Ambitious fish Oscar dreams of escaping his humdrum undersea life. His wish comes true when a gangster shark keen to escape a world of organised crime seeks his help in faking his own death. But Oscar soon finds himself out of his depth as his fearsome reputation gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Will Smith, Robert De Niro, Martin Scorsese, Renee Zellweger, Angelina Jolie and Jack Black.

programme.title: Rio 2
programme.desc: Parrots Jewel and Blu lead a happy life together in Rio with their three chicks, until they find themselves hurled into an expedition up the Amazon. The journey leads to an encounter with an old enemy, while Blu also has to win the approval of Jewel's fearsome father. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway and Jamie Foxx.

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: A farmer hears a mysterious voice inspiring him to mark out a baseball diamond in a cornfield - which, to his surprise, is visited by the ghost of the star player of the 1919 Chicago White Sox team, whose career was cut short by scandal. It later dawns on him the pitch has a greater purpose - to give people who have sacrificed important parts of their lives a second chance. Fantasy, starring Kevin Costner, Ray Liotta, Burt Lancaster and James Earl Jones.

programme.title: The Jewel of the Nile
programme.desc: A novelist travels to the Middle East to become a sheik's official biographer, only to end up being held hostage by him. Her lover joins forces with an old enemy to rescue her, but they get drawn into the hunt for a mysterious ancient treasure that has a connection to an eccentric holy man. Comedy adventure sequel to Romancing the Stone, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito.

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang of corrupt cops that carries out bank robberies under the noses of their law-abiding colleagues is blackmailed into carrying out a seemingly impossible heist by the Russian Mob. They realise that the only way to carry out the crime is to kill a police officer as a diversion. Crime thriller, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, Casey Affleck, Kate Winslet and Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: Welcome to the Punch
programme.desc: A criminal evades the law after a heist and goes into hiding overseas, leaving the detective on his trail tormented by his failure. He gets a second chance when the crook returns to visit his hospitalised son, but the investigation brings to light a conspiracy that threatens both men. Crime thriller, starring James McAvoy, Mark Strong, Andrea Riseborough and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Les Combattants
programme.desc: A directionless man facing an uncertain future meets a woman who believes that civilisation is doomed to fall apart very soon. He follows her to an army boot camp, where she is hoping to learn survival skills, and romance blossoms as they struggle with the hardships of their training. Romantic drama, starring Adele Haenel and Kevin Azais. In French.

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.sub-title: BSL Zone: Close Up: Ilyaas Cader
programme.desc: An interview with Ilyass Cader, a deaf refugee from Sri Lanka's civil war, who has made his home in Britain.

programme.title: Siege of the Saxons
programme.desc: King Arthur is betrayed and killed by one of his knights, who has formed an alliance with an invading Saxon horde and intends to seize the throne himself. However, the dead monarch's daughter is rescued by an outlaw, who seeks the aid of Merlin in ensuring the crown passes to her instead of the villainous usurper. Medieval adventure, starring Ronald Lewis, Janette Scott and John Laurie.

programme.title: 7th Cavalry
programme.desc: An army officer is branded a coward for failing to fight in the Battle of the Little Bighorn, and is unable to convince anyone that official business had detained him. In a bid to repair his damaged reputation, he leads a cavalry detail to retrieve the dead from the battlefield. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Jay C Flippen and Jeanette Nolan.

programme.title: Beau Geste
programme.desc: Three brothers are accused of stealing from their aristocratic adopted mother. They seek to salvage their honour by joining the Foreign Legion, battling a rampaging Arab army as well as coming into conflict with their sadistic commanding officer. Action adventure, starring Gary Cooper, Ray Milland, Robert Preston and Brian Donlevy.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: The ruler of the Persian empire vows to expand his realm by conquering Greece. The king of Sparta steps forward to defend his homeland and the other kingdoms of Greece, but when he is betrayed by a political council, he finds himself without an army and must fend off the vast invading army with a mere 300 warriors. Historical drama, starring Richard Egan, Ralph Richardson and Diane Baker.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A scientist and four members of his crew develop superhuman powers after exposure to cosmic radiation on a mission to study an energy storm in space. Unfortunately, one of them chooses to use his new-found abilities for evil purposes, compelling the others to join forces to stop him. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis and Julian McMahon.

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: A courier is kidnapped and forced to become a drug mule. When she is exposed to the experimental chemicals she is smuggling, it boosts her intelligence and reflexes to superhuman levels. She uses her newfound abilities to get revenge on her captors, but as the process continues, she evolves into something more than human. Sci-fi thriller, starring Scarlett Johansson and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
programme.desc: A US embassy in Libya comes under attack from extremists, who kill the ambassador. With no help in sight, a small band of CIA security operatives from various military backgrounds takes a stand to fight off the attackers and protect the remaining diplomatic personnel. Fact-based action thriller, starring John Krasinski and James Badge Dale.

programme.title: I Origins
programme.desc: A biologist researching the evolution of eyes uncovers shocking evidence that suggests people are reincarnations of the dead - a fact that could have far-reaching consequences for the human race. Drama, starring Michael Pitt, Brit Marling and Archie Panjabi.(n)

programme.title: Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Soldiers escaping the American Civil War take flight in a giant observation balloon and land far away on a strange uncharted island, where they encounter giant creatures, cut-throat pirates, two shipwrecked Englishwomen - and the mysterious Captain Nemo. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Michael Craig, Herbert Lom, Joan Greenwood and Michael Callan, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen.(n)

programme.title: None Shall Escape
programme.desc: German military officer Wilhelm Grimm is tried for crimes committed during the Second World War, and his life and career is shown in a series of flashbacks. Returning seriously injured and disenchanted from the Great War to a village on the German-Polish border, his subsequent actions caused him banishment from the community and he is attracted to the Nazi Party. Drama, starring Alexander Knox.(n)

programme.title: Crack in the World
programme.desc: A dying scientist and his colleagues conduct experiments to harness the Earth's inner energy which seem set to end in disaster. Sci-fi thriller, with Dana Andrews, Janette Scott, Kieron Moore and Alexander Knox.(n)

programme.title: Warlock
programme.desc: A ruthless vigilante is recruited as a sheriff to clean up the streets of a crime-ridden town, but his strong-arm tactics soon antagonise the townsfolk. When a woman turns up and accuses the lawman of murdering her fiance, the residents rally to her cause with the help of a rival gunslinger. Western, starring Henry Fonda, Richard Widmark, Anthony Quinn, DeForest Kelley and Dorothy Malone.(n)

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: A streetwise cop is enlisted by a top-secret government force dedicated to policing alien visitors to Earth, teaming up with a veteran agent just as a body-swapping extraterrestrial giant insect begins a reign of terror throughout New York City. Sci-fi comedy, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, Rip Torn and Vincent D'Onofrio.(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An American takes a job in an Asian nation and relocates his family overseas. However, no sooner do they arrive then a revolution takes the country by storm. They face a struggle for survival as the new government seeks to eliminate all foreigners. Action thriller, starring Owen Wilson, Pierce Brosnan and Lake Bell.(n)

programme.title: Haywire
programme.desc: A mercenary is employed by the US government to carry out secret assignments, but on her latest mission, she is set up by one of the operatives who hired her. She fights her way through the world of international espionage in search of revenge, fending off assassins as she tries to find out who betrayed her. Action thriller, starring Gina Carano, Ewan McGregor, Michael Fassbender and Antonio Banderas.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy receives a visit from cousin Homer, but the Baldwin sisters are unaware of his criminal record until he makes off with much of the stock for their reunion banquet recipe.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: After meeting an itinerant singer, a restless Mary Ellen decides to run away from home. However, when he does not take kindly to her following him, she disappears again and is left up to John-Boy to find her. Meanwhile, the rest of the family works hard picking apples to save enough money to send her on a trip to Washington to cure her wanderlust.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura realises she is in love with Jimmy while they are out collecting frogs. Meanwhile, Caroline becomes unhappy as Charles' new job takes him away with increasing frequency.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary takes a teaching job in an isolated town, but soon finds her methods are too radical for the conservative residents. Melissa Sue Anderson stars.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Joanie loses Leo's trust when she lets out a secret on radio.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A tornado strikes, interrupting Syd and Owen's final wedding preparations and events soon take a dramatic turn.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth falls for a new teacher, but is devastated to find he does not have long to live. Meanwhile, Ben worries about his new responsibilities as Cindy gives birth to a girl.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Josh gets caught breaking into Ike's store with Jeffrey, who manages to get away without being seen. Meanwhile, Ben decides to enlist after being humiliated by a soldier.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Zadok Walton, Grandpa's cousin, arrives unannounced to keep a date he made with Zeb 21 years earlier.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mamie Baldwin develops a cataract, but refuses to undergo an operation, forcing John to take desperate measures.

programme.title: A Kind of Loving
programme.desc: A factory worker gets his girlfriend pregnant, forcing them to endure years of misery and dashed hopes as they marry and move in with her disapproving, nagging mother. John Schlesinger's drama, starring Alan Bates, June Ritchie and Thora Hird.

programme.title: A Change of Place
programme.desc: A shy girl whose identical twin is a supermodel is persuaded to take her glamorous sister's place on the Paris catwalks, little suspecting a life-changing romance is waiting just around the corner. Drama, with Andrea Roth, Rick Springfield and Stephanie Beacham.

programme.title: Montana Sky
programme.desc: Three women with the same father but different mothers meet for the first time after their estranged father dies. They discover he has left them his ranch in his will - on the condition that they run the estate together for at least a year. Unfortunately, they soon learn the old man had enemies determined to make sure they fail. Drama, starring Ashley Williams, Charlotte Ross and Laura Mennell.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Kaleidoscope
programme.desc: Three young sisters and their brother are orphaned in early childhood, and while three of them are found loving and protective homes, one suffers a life of neglect and poverty. Thirty years later they are reunited, but the elder sister has a shocking secret she needs to share. Drama based on a novel by Danielle Steel, starring Jaclyn Smith, Perry King, Colleen Dewhurst and Claudia Christian.

programme.title: She Drives Me Crazy
programme.desc: A woman whose husband has recently died is invited on a road trip by her wilder estranged sister. The widow soon learns her younger sibling has a very important reason for taking this journey, which changes both their lives for ever. Drama, starring Krista Bridges and Melinda Clarke.

programme.title: Bringing Ashley Home
programme.desc: When Libba Phillips' troubled younger sister Ashley suddenly goes missing, she sets out to locate her sibling and bring her home. As the years go by, Libba's resolve remains true, at the expense of her marriage and her career. However, personal loss does not deter her from the mission, and she finds a new calling in life creating a resource centre for the families of other people who have falled through the cracks. Fact-based drama, starring AJ Cook.

programme.title: A Sister's Secret
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town, hoping to save a paper mill owned by her father's company. However, she attracts the attention of her high-school boyfriend's sister, who blames her for his untimely death and seeks the opportunity to take revenge. Thriller, starring Alexandra Paul, Cynthia Preston and Paul Whitney.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A famous film star is stranded on the mountain when her car breaks down and is invited to stay with the Waltons, putting on a one-woman show to raise her train fare back to the city. While she charms most of the family, Olivia is not convinced by her tall tales. Pippa Scott and Dorothy Neuman guest star.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A girl befriended by the family is shocked to learn her drunken father was responsible for burning down the school to prevent Miss Hunter teaching the theory of evolution.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caroline prepares to celebrate her wedding anniversary, but a broken wheel on Charles's wagon looks set to thwart the evening. Drama, starring Michael Landon.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Please Be My Friend - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Laura traces the author of a letter in a bottle, only to end up holding the baby. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Melissa Gilbert.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Just as Syd and Owen are about to embark on a new life of marital bliss, a hostage situation breaks out at the ER.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A hostage situation at the ER breaks out spoiling Syd and Owen's marital bliss.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan helps a paralysed man who has fallen in love, but fears his condition will ruin the relationship. Mark is reluctant to get involved, as the woman in question is his cousin.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A greedy tycoon meets a kindly homeless man who is his exact double, and they decide to switch places to see how the other half lives. Guest starring Ned Beatty in a dual role.

programme.title: A Soldier's Love Story
programme.desc: A sergeant in the US Army serving in Afghanistan becomes a father figure to a lonely boy who writes to him from California. When the soldier returns from his tour of duty, he visits the youngster and begins to develop a relationship with the lad's divorced mother. Romantic drama, with Lori Loughlin and Johnny Messner.

programme.title: A Lover's Revenge
programme.desc: A radio psychologist gives some advice to a distraught woman desperate to escape from an abusive partner. When the female listener plucks up the courage to end the relationship, her deranged ex-lover blames the presenter, and he decides to pay her a visit. Thriller, starring Alexandra Paul, William Moses and Gary Hudson.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy learns the sheriff is a war hero, but wants to forget the terrible things he witnessed during the conflict.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Richest Man in Walnut Grove
programme.desc: Charles and his boss anticipate a large income from a big job. However things fail to go according to plan, which puts a financial strain on the family as they pull together to make ends meet.

programme.title: McBride: It's Murder, Madam
programme.desc: An aspiring actress thinks she has landed on her feet when she is offered a job straight after arriving in town - but her good fortune proves short-lived when she is accused of murdering her new boss. Luckily, maverick lawyer McBride is happy to help clear her name. Crime drama, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois, Matt Lutz and Claire Coffee.

programme.title: McBride: Murder Past Midnight
programme.desc: The crusading lawyer is called up for jury duty in the case of a woman thought to have poisoned her wealthy husband. However, he ends up reluctantly agreeing to defend the accused when she is retried. Mystery, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois and Matt Lutz.

programme.title: Jacqueline Bouvier Kennedy
programme.desc: The first of a two-part mini-series exploring the life of the First Lady, from her years as a photojournalist to her husband's election as President. Starring Jaclyn Smith and James Franciscus.

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: An ambitious bartender and his mentor become the talk of New York before their differences drive them apart. Relocating in Jamaica, the barman is torn between the waitress he loves and a wealthy older woman who can make his dreams of running his own establishment come true. Drama, starring Tom Cruise, Bryan Brown, Elisabeth Shue and Lisa Banes.

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: An ambitious bartender and his mentor become the talk of New York before their differences drive them apart. Relocating in Jamaica, the barman is torn between the waitress he loves and a wealthy older woman who can make his dreams of running his own establishment come true. Drama, starring Tom Cruise, Bryan Brown, Elisabeth Shue and Lisa Banes.

programme.title: The Boy She Met Online
programme.desc: A teenage girl falls madly in love with someone claiming to be a college student, whom she meets on a social networking website, and keeps her internet romance a secret from her mother. However, she is unaware that everything he has told her about himself is a lie. Drama, starring Tracy Spiridakos, Jon Cor and Alexandra Paul.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy falls for Jenny Pendleton, who has run away from her home in Richmond and taken refuge on Walton's Mountain, but his romantic bliss proves short-lived.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia's timid uncle Cody Nelson pays a visit to the family after losing his job in a bank, and John-Boy and Grandpa set out to find him a wife. programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Please Be My Friend - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. Laura traces the author of a letter in a bottle, only to end up holding the baby. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Melissa Gilbert.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Friends and neighbours advise Charles on how to spend an inheritance he receives from a wealthy relative, but it isn't long before the farm is at risk, as he blows the cash prematurely. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Melissa Gilbert.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Pilot episode of the drama, starring Melina Kanakaredes as a plastic surgeon forced to reassess her life after a tragic accident. programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd starts work at the clinic, but is troubled at having to move back to Providence. Luckily, her spirits are soon lifted by the return of an old flame. Meanwhile, Joanie decides on a name for her daughter. Drama, starring Melina Kanakaredes and Mike Farrell.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan meets a spoiled child star who has let fame go to her head, and tries to make her see the harm her selfish behaviour is causing her family.(n)

programme.title: Dreams Lost, Dreams Found

programme.title: In the Arms of a Killer
programme.desc: A rookie homicide cop lands herself in a dilemma after making the foolish mistake of becoming romantically involved with the prime suspect in a drug-related murder case. Thriller, starring Jaclyn Smith, John Spencer, Michael Nouri, Nina Foch and Sandahl Bergman.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy is sent to report on the landing of the Hindenburg, but is traumatised when he witnesses its destruction and the deaths of many passengers.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A decline in Mary's school performance is explained when Charles discovers that she needs glasses. However, she loses her confidence when her classmates begin to tease her.(n)

programme.title: McBride: The Chameleon Murder
programme.desc: An apparently straightforward murder case takes a strange turn when the victim is discovered to have a plethora of identities - prompting McBride to investigate in an effort to prove his client innocent of the killing. Crime drama, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois, Annie LaRussa and Devon Gummersall.(n)

programme.title: McBride: The Doctor Is Out, Really Out
programme.desc: The crusading lawyer takes on a custody case, only for his client to later confess to having murdered the psychiatrist who testified against him. However, when McBride shows up at the doctor's house, the body is nowhere to be found. Mystery directed by and starring John Larroquette, with Marta DuBois, Matt Lutz and Stephen Tobolowsky.(n)

programme.title: Jacqueline Bouvier Kennedy
programme.desc: The second in a two-part mini-series exploring the life of the First Lady, from her years as a photojournalist to her husband's election as President. Starring Jaclyn Smith and James Franciscus.(n)

programme.title: People Like Us
programme.desc: A salesman returns home for his father's funeral, and is surprised to discover a mysterious beneficiary in the will. He realises he has a sister he never knew existed, and tracks down the woman and her son, hoping to uncover the truth about his father's past - but does not reveal himself as her brother. Drama, starring Chris Pine, Elizabeth Banks and Michelle Pfeiffer.(n)

programme.title: People Like Us

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: Reid and the team leave their urban patch and head for the countryside to examine a farmer's suspicious death in a blaze - but instead of discovering a rural idyll, they find themselves in the middle of a war between the victim's neighbours. DCI Burke's private life comes to the fore as inquiries proceed, and a second fire gives the case added urgency. Blythe Duff, Alex Norton and Colin McCredie star.(n)

programme.title: Have You Seen My Son
programme.desc: A woman strives to find her sick son after he is kidnapped by her ex-husband. Drama, starring Lisa Hartman Black, William Russ, Jameson Parker, Anne Francis and Scott Hylands.
